Sql.query: insert into ext_logpro( mencodi, logpdetmen, logpfechor, logpsecuen, earcodi ) values( :mencodi, :logpdetmen, :logpfechor, :logpsecuen, :earcodi )
update ext_logpro set mencodi = :mencodi, logpdetmen = :logpdetmen, logpfechor = :logpfechor, logpsecuen = :logpsecuen, earcodi = :earcodi where
select mencodi, logpdetmen, logpfechor, logpsecuen, earcodi where from ext_logpro

select mencodi, logpdetmen, logpfechor, logpsecuen, earcodi
from ext_logpro

select mencodi, logpdetmen, logpfechor, logpsecuen, earcodi
from ext_logpro
